message.entry: Wrong number of input variables for ENCODE.
Message format must be either binary or decimal.
The codeword length, N must be a positive integer greater than 0.
The message length, K must be a positive integer greater than 0.
The codeword length, N must be greater than the message length, K.
For decimal data processing, MSG must contain only integers between 0 and 2^K-1.
MSG does not match specified data format. Either make MSG binary or append /decimal to the method string.
The matrix MSG in ENCODE must have K columns.
The specified codeword length and message length are not valid.
The generator matrix is a required input argument for linear block code.
The generator matrix dimensions are not valid.
No generator polynomial satisfies the given constraints of N and K.
For ''{0}'' code with decimal data, MSG must be a vector.
